detaileddescription.para: The function converts the relative position into an absolute and draws the point

briefdescription.para: Function to draw a straight line.

detaileddescription.para: This function identifies the type of line based on the parameters provided and then draws the line point by point

detaileddescription.para:
The function determines the position of the parabola and renders point by point. Finally, draw a line between each point to give a sense of continuity
parabola
Contains the parabola parameters
renderer
Renderer to which to draw the line

The function calculates the radius and the coordinates of the center and then goes to draw the circumference using the algorithm of the intermediate point that allows to obtain good performances and also good precision

Contains the circumference parameters

briefdescription.para: Function to find tangents to a circumference.

detaileddescription.para:
The function identifies the type of hyperbole and then proceeds to the drawing, they draw a line between each point calculated in order to obtain excellent precision without wasting resources.
